subject: Football
Assaults
lead_paragraph: Cedric Benson, the Cincinnati Bengals’ leading rusher for the last three seasons, was arrested in Austin, Tex., on a misdemeanor charge of assault with bodily injury with family violence.
snippet: Cedric Benson, the Cincinnati Bengals’ leading rusher for the last three seasons, was arrested in Austin, Tex., on a misdemeanor charge of assault with bodily injury with family violence.
